name: KinomotoSakuraMod(木之本樱)
description:
Kinomoto Sakura, the protagonist of animation Card Captor Sakura.
English localization completed. (translated by software, lrevisions are welcome)
e-mail:477630080@qq.com
new version is coming soon

2020.7.2 Update: 
Spell Release: the effect increasing 25%/50% -> 50%/100%
Clow Card The Erase: kill line 25%/50% -> 33%/66%, add killing minion effect. 
the wands: add extra charge when kill elite and boss 3/5/10
Sakura Card The Return: recharge restoring 50% -> 75%

2020.7.6 Update: 
Fix the English version of startup crash bug. 
Add Earthy Element, Windy Element and Watery Element vision effects. 

2020.7.18 Update: 
Add Turning vision effect.

动画《魔卡少女樱》的主角木之本樱。
英文本地化已完成（机翻，欢迎修改优化）。
欢迎各位玩家提出宝贵的意见和建议。
联系方式：QQ 477630080(兔子舒)。
新版本内容制作中

2020.7.2更新内容：
符咒 解：效果提升25%/50% → 效果提升50%/100%
库洛牌 消：斩杀线25%/50%→33%/66%，新增爪牙斩杀
小樱牌 回：恢复充能50%→75%
封印之杖系列：增加击杀精英和boss额外获得充能3/5/10

2020.7.6更新内容：
修复英文版启动崩溃bug
添加地元素、水元素、风元素特效

2020.7.18更新内容：
添加转变特效
